description:
Imagine a day with:

  • An Empty Inbox
  • No Meetings
  • Trust In Your Team

Do you know your habits in leading virtual teams? The purpose, cause or belief that inspires you to do what you do? This course can help you become a unique virtual leader.

You might have ask yourself:

  • How can I build trust in my virtual team?
  • How can I ensure that my virtual meetings don't end up in pointless discussions?
  • How can I motivate my virtual team?
  • How can ensure progress when we are split in different time zones?
  • How can I keep the energy high?

In this online course, video-led, Jesper Sonne trains you through how you master virtual teamwork as a project manager, manager, senior manager or an executive. After the course you will be enabled to increase your - and your team's efficiency up to 50%.
title: 5 Habits for effective Virtual Leadership
